A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: No spoilers because if i told anyone what happened they would refund their tickets. Upon first viewing this film is Utter Blasphemy. Great characters and performances destroyed through jumbled plot lines that lead nowhere. Moments that should be epic are made pitiful. Rian Johnson should be ashamed. When the movie ended I felt as if everything I loved about Star Wars was gone. Disney should stop the production of the 3rd film I'm order to save the company from embarrassment.
